tags: thanks for caring about my opinion!
summary: Any thoughts on the last trailer of Killing Eve? More specifically in the part 0:53 of the trailer. Villanelle is walking out...
question: Any thoughts on the last trailer of Killing Eve? More specifically in the part 0:53 of the trailer. Villanelle is walking out the apartment, the same apartment that the previous trailers implied to be where Villanelle and Eve "encounter" each other behind the door. She looks a bit shaken, like she's going to cry or something. Whatcha think? Do you think that Villanelle can actually feel things? I mean, they said she's a psychopath, which technically makes her unable to feel stuff...
answer:
Not to be a villain apologist but: I don’t think Villanelle is a full-blown psychopath. I actually made a small post about this recently lol. I know that she has been referred to as such, but there’s evidence on-screen to show us otherwise.

Don’t get me wrong, this doesn’t make her a good person. Far from it. And I do think she definitely has psychopathic traits. (A pretty extreme lack of empathy and a love for violence). But imo she doesn’t have the emotionless part of it. We saw in S1 that Villanelle is capable of feeling things. If she didn’t, Konstatin and Eve wouldn’t have been able to manipulate her the way they did by appealing to her emotions. (She was visibly shaken when Konstatin told her he loved her. And then seemed genuinely hurt when Eve first stabbed her). She was also clearly feeling some sort of turmoil when she and Irina first arrived at Anna’s apartment. Villanelle is very selective about the things she shows emotion towards but it does happen.

So with that in mind, I do believe there’s a chance that whatever she seems upset about in that scene IS genuine. I think it might be further proof of my theory that the hotel scene is an ALMOST reunion between Villanelle and Eve. Maybe they almost reunite but Villanelle see’s or overhears something that upsets her and she leaves before Eve can see her.

As for what that is: This is complete guess work but I’m thinking maybe she finds out that Eve is tracking another female assasin and feels betrayed by it. From the spoilers we’ve heard, it seems that Villanelle is going to be pining for Eve pretty hard this season. Referring to her as her “girlfriend” and trying to get back to her. So I think finding out that Eve’s attention isn’t solely on her anymore while her attention IS solely on Eve would be a pretty good slap in the face for Villanelle. (Of course, I think Eve tracking the new assasin is going to be largely about her trying to fill the void Villanelle left but….Villanelle won’t know this. And she’ll see it as Eve replacing her).

Villanelle just seems like the kind of person that would see Eve giving her attention to someone else as a bigger betrayal than stabbing her lol.

tags: but they're important to indicate interest
summary: Reminder that Killing Eve will air on both BBC America and AMC channels for Season 2. It can also be streamed on iTunes or...
body:
Reminder that Killing Eve will air on both BBC America and AMC channels for Season 2. It can also be streamed on iTunes or Amazon.

The numbers were really important for how well KE did for Season 1, even though the show was renewed for Season 2 even before it aired. It was the phenomenon that the show was picking up viewers over time that really launched it into interest. In the hiatus, new viewers have been catching up with the show, so I think the season premiere numbers will be strong.

It’s the numbers for the following episodes that will be the real test.

If you can watch legally, especially if you enjoy the show, please do, just to buffer the numbers.

summary: how eve tells kenny that she stabbed villanelle screaming it in his way and his response being a highpitched “WAT!” but then...
body:
how eve tells kenny that she stabbed villanelle screaming it in his way and his response being a highpitched “WAT!” but then hugo walks in with that ridiculous whistle turning the scene funnier than the sound of crickets would and interrupts them and eve and kenny just stay silent and look around each other like yes this is somethin very secretive and SEXUAL SOMEHOW

“YEA…………………..i……….STABBED…….HER”
